billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Provides for discontinuance of the Cross Bay Veterans Memorial Bridge toll plaza in the county of Queens
summary: Provides for the discontinuance by the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority of the Cross Bay Veterans Memorial Bridge toll plaza in the county of Queens for the collection of tolls.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1040

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. PHEFFER -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A. TOWNS
         -- read once and referred to the Committee on  Corporations,  Authori-
         ties and Commissions

       AN  ACT  in  relation  to  discontinuing the Cross Bay Veterans Memorial
         Bridge toll plaza

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Notwithstanding any contrary provision of law, the Tribor-
    2  ough bridge and tunnel authority shall discontinue the Cross Bay  Veter-
    3  ans  Memorial  Bridge  toll  plaza  in  the  county  of  Queens  for the
    4  collection of tolls.
    5    S 2. This act shall take effect on the thirtieth day  after  it  shall
    6  have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00369-01-1
actClause: AN ACT in relation to discontinuing the Cross Bay Veterans Memorial Bridge toll plaza
